page.title: 04LOXLEY VALLEY MANAGEMENT.
page.content: The Loxley Valley Management Project is to try and reconcile conflicting uses and pressures on the valley,and conserve its landscape quality and unique industrial and natural history. The valley links the city and the open moorland of the Peak District.It is a recreational area for the people of Stannington,Loxley and Hillsborough. The valley is part of the Green Belt and is safe from residential(housing) and industrial development.The project will help conserve and improve the rural character of the area. Improvements to the valley will depend on the actions of the City Council and the active support of farmers,local residents,factory workers and school children.Myers Grove School Conservation Group works closely with the project.
